mapper.sql: id, name, organization_code, cluster_id, version_id, server_type, host_id, k8s_id, docker_id, env_type, enable, ssh_id, endpoint, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag

i.id, i.name, i.organization_code, i.cluster_id, i.version_id, i.server_type, i.host_id, i.k8s_id, i.docker_id, i.env_type, i.enable, i.ssh_id, i.endpoint, i.remark, i.create_by, i.create_date, i.update_by, i.update_date, i.del_flag

s.id as 's.id', s.name as 's.name', s.username as 's.username', s.password as 's.password', s.ssh_key as 's.ssh_key', s.ssh_key_pub as 's.ssh_key_pub', s.auth_type as 's.auth_type', s.create_by as 's.create_by', s.create_date as 's.create_date', s.update_by as 's.update_by', s.update_date as 's.update_date', s.del_flag as 's.del_flag'
mapper.select: select ,,h.hostname from erm_app_instance i left join erm_ssh s on s.id = i.ssh_id left join erm_host h on h.id = i.host_id where i.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from erm_app_instance where cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag!=1

select ,,h.hostname from erm_app_instance i left join erm_ssh s on s.id = i.ssh_id left join erm_host h on h.id = i.host_id where i.cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and i.env_type = #{envType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.del_flag!=1
select count(1) from erm_app_instance where cluster_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag!=1
